title: Stole Fragments, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: wool, linen
Technique: two interconnected structures
description: Two parts of a stole, formerly joined, in blue-green and off-white. Design has small-scale palmettes framed by banded S-curves in off-white on a blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stole Fragments, 16th–17th century.Medium: wool, linen
Technique: two interconnected structures. 1961-84-11-a,b.
